current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
To repeal the Patient Protection and
		  Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and
		  Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.

action-desc.#text:
Read the second time and placed on the
			 calendar

attestation-date.#text:
Passed the House of
			 Representatives May 16, 2013.

action-desc.#text:
Read the second time and placed on the
		  calendar

header.#text:
Repeal of PPACA and health
			 care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of
			 2010

text.#text:
Effective
			 as of the enactment of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, such Act is repealed, and the provisions of law
			 amended or repealed by such Act are restored or revived as if such Act had not
			 been enacted.
